short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the profit made by cross-platform trading!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to easily calculate the total amount of profit and loss from cross platform trading. It also has some other features to assist with the trading.
